{"id":928358579,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680685026,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/928358579/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\nprivate:\n    int next_number(int n) {\n        long new_num = 0;\n        while(n) {\n            int num = n % 10;\n            new_num +=  num * num;\n            n = n/10;\n        }\n        return new_num;\n    }\n    \npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        unordered_set<int> set;\n        while(n != 1 && (set.count(n) == 0)) {\n            set.insert(n);\n            n = next_number(n);\n        }\n        return n == 1;\n    }\n};\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
